DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To investigate whether patient undergo aquatic physiotherapy group improve functional capacity , mean distance cover six-minute walk test ( 6WT ) , compare control group . Methods : Forty woman practice regular physical activity one year randomly allocate either Study Group ( SG ) undergo aquatic physiotherapy program group apply twice week , include aerobic exercise , muscle strengthen relaxation 12 week , Control Group ( CG ) , physical activity . Both group maintain treatment medication . All patient underwent two evaluation : one start 12 week .
DOC.criteria: Patients gender medical diagnosis FS , without age restriction without impaired cognition , practice regular physical activity one year Presence rheumatic disease cardiovascular problem Smoking Absence medical permission swim pool activity Starting therapy , change and/or discontinuation medical treatment
